mdRecord.dcterms:title: Side By Side by Sondheim
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Playbill for Side By Side by Sondheim by Stephen Sondheim. Directed and Choreographed by Pamela Hunt. Sep 21- Oct 16, 1983.

Virginia
